name: Setsujoku
description:
WASD - Movement

Space Bar - Dash

Left Click - Sword Attack

Right Click - Throw Kunai

Follow this nameless Ronin on a journey to reclaim his honor.

Developed for LOWREZJAM 2019.  

Music by Spark Fist! Check out his work here https://soundcloud.com/sparkfist1

Never done pixel art before in my life, but I drew up the main character (Inspired by Legend of Xenia's Style) and his throwing knife.  Other sprites came from https://0x72.itch.io/dungeontileset-ii

It's incomplete and unpolished but it's my first project as a game dev so be gentle :>
